name: Eludim
body:
### Welcome to Eludim
Tired of lightbox modals disrupting your browsing? Don't want to sign up but just want to look? Hey! Since when was looking illegal anyway?

Install Eludim today to dim the lightbox and elude them all. 

### Usage
1. Toggle on the wand by clicking the extension icon. 
2. Click on the modal to delete it. There maybe multiple modals you wish to delete.
3. After you are done with the wand, click on the extension icon to toggle it off. 

### Authors and Contributors
Authored by Yuan Yuan (@galacticmonkeys)

### Contact
Bugs? Feature request? Please send me an email at yyuan95@gmail.com with "Eludim" in the title. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
